Supposedly a man from Indonesia took down some big meme pages/groups. There have also been people saying that he's on the furry side of the internet spectrum, and I guess that makes things worse because of the stigma. Whoever the guy is, he's supposedly gotten a big following (not positive of course) and will continue targeting big groups on Facebook to take down. From what I see, nobody is really aware as to why or how he is getting these groups permanently taken down, but now everyone is in a panic to hide their groups from being found in search results.
